node.text:
From roasts to pies to puddings! Let this Christmas be the most delicious one yet with a lavish festive spread that awaits you on December 24th at the Christmas dinner. To add to the holiday spirit, we have lined up fun activities including DJ, Games, Carols & much more!

For bookings contact: 0471 – 3051234, 1800-4252-2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com, reservations@theraviz.com
